"thank you, Liono..." said Plintissa. "i won't ever touch the black book"
she said...she was curious on what was in it, but would not open it
anyhow.....ever.....she looked at the weapon with curiosity, not knowing how
powerful it could possibly be........
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 3:46 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Liono: Welcome first things first Iron Raptor Your My 3rd in command when
I'm
> not here TigerHawk and you will call the shots you showed what I was
looking
> for you took charge and Fought your battle well. Plisstana I expect great
> things form you in the future.
> ::Opens Chest spark code scan closes chest and the door opens::
> this is my study of weapons and books yet to be released most never get to
> see this.
> But that not what your here for its time to get you weapons. These are
> weapons used by cybertorns greatest. ::scans both maximals::
>
> Here they go ::a giant 4 pointed star goes to Plissanta::  ::while Iron
gets
> a double edged sword that ends with  3 triangles on the end of each side::
> the weapon you just received a better than any blaster you can find learn
> them well.
>
> Also feel free to explore this room but do not touch the black case
::points
> to a case with a lion on it and leaves::
>
